portfolio.title: MovieNest
portfolio.description: The Movie Search App is a user-friendly web application that allows movie enthusiasts to search for movies, view their details, and save their favorite movies. It provides an easy way to discover new movies and keep track of movie preferences.

portfolio.title: Fast Lane Rentals
portfolio.description: Fast Lane Rentals is a car rental app that makes it simpler for you to pick a car, rent it and pay for it. All you need to rent a car, is to be of leagal driving age and obviously have a driver's license...for insurance purposes. This is car rental app meant to make your life a tad bit easier.

portfolio.title: SpendSmart
portfolio.description: Expense Tracker is a MERN stack single-page application designed to assist users in managing their finances effectively. It allows users to track their daily, weekly, monthly, and yearly expenses, integrating a user-friendly interface and real-time data processing. The application is built with React for the front end, GraphQL with a Node.js and Express.js server, and MongoDB along with Mongoose ODM for the database.
